Title: Authorizes a special account to create safe city streets, safe city, safe schools program in city of Yonkers
Summary: Authorizes the city of Yonkers to establish a separate fund into which revenue earmarked for the safe city streets, safe streets, safe schools program will be deposited.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the city of Yonkers to create a safe city streets, safe city, safe schools program
